member.name: P:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.name: T:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.CurrentArrestController
member.summary: Returns a Current Arrest List. This list is individuals that have been arrested in the past five days, sorted by arrest date with the most current being first (descending).

member.name: T:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.CurrentArrestStringController
member.summary: Returns a Current Arrest List. This list is individuals that have been arrested in the past five days, sorted by arrest date with the most current being first (descending). This is different from CurrentArrest in that the Charges are a single string value delimited by a pipe "|" character.

member.name: M:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.CurrentArrestStringController.GetCurrentArrests
member.summary: Get the Current Arrest List as strings

member.summary: Get the combiled wait time queues per department at the DMV

member.summary: Individual wait time queues at the DMV.

member.name: M:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.DMVWaitTimeQueueController.GetEntitiesServices
member.summary: Get the individual wait time queues at the DMV
member.returns: Returns the current wait time by queue and wait times. Currently there are 20 or so queues. Key is the queue name and value is the current wait time.

member.name: M:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.HomeController.Index
member.returns: A Page or null and a Redirect

member.name: T:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.JailListController
member.summary: Returns a Jail List. A Jail List being the first letter of the last name of individuals currently in County Jail. If a letter of the alphabet is missing from this list that means no one is in Jail with a last name that starts with that letter.

member.name: M:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.JailListController.GetJailList
member.returns: A List of first letters or the last name of individuals currently in Jail. A missing letter means no one by that letter of last name is currently in jail.

member.name: T:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.JailRosterByLetterController
member.summary: Jail Roster are those individuals currently in the County Jail

member.name: M:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.JailRosterByLetterController.GetJailRosterByLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the current jail roster of individuals with a last name matching the first character of {id}
member.param: The First Letter of the Last Name
member.returns: A List or Array of Individuals matching {id}. If no {id} is passed it defaults to "A"

member.name: T:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.JailRosterByNameController
member.summary: Jail Roster are those individuals currently in the County Jail

member.name: M:CC.MT.Public.Sheriff.Controllers.JailRosterByNameController.GetJailRosterByName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the current jail roster of individuals with a name matching {id} (First or Last)
member.param: The First or Last Name of the individual
member.returns: A List of Inmate that match {id}
